title: 과거완료 & 과거 결합
description: 과거완료와 일반 과거를 섞어 써서 이야기하기를 연습합니다.
examples: After I had finished the report, I submitted it and waited for feedback.
She had prepared thoroughly for the interview, so she answered confidently and got the job.
The team had analyzed the data carefully, then they presented their findings.
learning_points: 과거완료와 과거시제를 연계하여 순차적 사건 묘사

sentences.kr: 보고서를 마친 후, 나는 그것을 제출하고 피드백을 기다렸다.
sentences.en: After I had finished the report, I submitted it and waited for feedback.

sentences.kr: 그녀는 면접을 위해 철저히 준비했었기 때문에 자신 있게 답변했고 일자리를 얻었다.
sentences.en: She had prepared thoroughly for the interview, so she answered confidently and got the job.

sentences.kr: 팀이 데이터를 주의 깊게 분석한 후, 그들은 발견 사항을 발표했다.
sentences.en: The team had analyzed the data carefully, then they presented their findings.

sentences.kr: 회사가 신제품을 개발한 후, 시장 조사를 실시했고 좋은 반응을 얻었다.
sentences.en: After the company had developed the new product, they conducted market research and received positive feedback.

sentences.kr: 그는 여러 대안을 검토한 후 최선의 선택을 했고 성공을 거두었다.
sentences.en: He had reviewed several alternatives, then made the best choice and achieved success.

sentences.kr: 프로젝트 계획을 완료하지 못했기 때문에 회의가 연기되었다.
sentences.en: Since we had not completed the project plan, the meeting was postponed.

sentences.kr: 고객이 요구 사항을 명확히 한 후, 우리는 새로운 제안서를 작성했다.
sentences.en: After the client had clarified their requirements, we wrote a new proposal.

sentences.kr: 시장 상황을 분석한 후, 경영진은 새로운 전략을 수립했고 즉시 실행했다.
sentences.en: Having analyzed market conditions, management established a new strategy and implemented it immediately.
